title: Book 8: Who Likes Hot Chocolate?

description: Mike McCarthy is at it again with his latest moneymaking scheme. When no one buys his hot chocolate on a bitterly cold day, a disappointed Mike reconsiders how he's conducting business. Who Likes Hot Chocolate? can also be used to teach students how to analyze characters and identify and use contractions.
